titles.title: CB 191 In the Name of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
IN THE NAME OF JESUS,
In the name of Jesus, we have the victory! In the
name of Jesus, in the name of Jesus, Satan will
have to flee. When we stand in the name of
Jesus, tell me, who can stand before us? When
we stand in Thy name, Lord Jesus, we have the
victory.
